changeVotingInterval(uint256).details: Changes the time iteration  between intervals

delegateVoting(address).details: Allows user to delegate their full voting power to another user

params.delegatedAddress: the address to which you are delegating your voting rights

distributeFunds().details: Anyone can call this every 2 weeks (more specifically every *iteration interval*) to receive a reward, and increment onto the next iteration of voting

noLossCreateProposal(string,address).details: Checks whether user is eligible to create a proposal then creates it. Executes a range of logic to add the new propsal (increments proposal ID, sets proposal owner, sets iteration joined, etc...)
noLossCreateProposal(string,address).return: boolean whether the above executes successfully

noLossDeposit(address).details: Checks whether user is eligible deposit and sets the proposal iteration joined, to the current iteration

params.userAddress: address of the user wanting to deposit

noLossDeposit(address).return: boolean whether the above executes successfully

noLossWithdraw(address).details: Checks whether user is eligible to withdraw their deposit and sets the proposal iteration joined to zero

params.userAddress: address of the user wanting to withdraw

noLossWithdraw(address).return: boolean whether the above executes successfully

noLossWithdrawProposal(address).details: Checks whether user is eligible to withdraw their proposal Sets the state of the users proposal to withdrawn resets the iteration of user joined back to 0
noLossWithdrawProposal(address).return: boolean whether the above is possible

voteDirect(uint256).details: Allows user to vote for an active proposal. Once voted they cannot withdraw till next iteration.

params.proposalIdToVoteFor: Id of the proposal they are voting for

voteProxy(uint256,address).details: Allows user proxy to vote on behalf of a user.

params.delegatedFrom: user they are voting on behalf of
params.proposalIdToVoteFor: Id of the proposal they are voting for
